documents.document: Only cats could lead to me having a casual catch-up with friends over twitter
@bionictoaster Ray no longer there all the time!? That's heartbreaking </3 Daisy I bet is still cute- does she still do the window thing?
@LizzieWilliams8 of course!!
@bionictoaster Exactly like why are you clingy if you're also going to be a sod; love me or leave me don't do this - how're the other pets?
@bionictoaster I know, he's mental, he'll attack my leg and be such a sod that just wants food, but I miss my little fluffy face nuzzler
@bionictoaster I fully understand this - going home on Thursday and all I can think is I get to see Georgie boy again soon haha
People who think my friends and I joke about HSM nights, do not even deserve to appear on my radar. Be gone, why would I joke about that?
Some days, I really would love to just scream at people
so our buzzer went off but no one is downstairs...time to lock the doors and all windows and be terrified
Just walked into Chloe's room and asked her to read some Burns poetry as standard on Burns Night
I'm calm, I can remain calm and go back to studying climate change and all my lovely geography stuff
I watch Fresh Prince to calm down and escape from the world for a bit. And then Donald Trump is a guest star and there goes any peace I had.
I've done literally no work since getting back like an hour and a half ago I've just annoyed people what is life
I'm an awful human being, I am aware. But it's still really funny because now I know the songs are stuck in her head
One of my favourite forms of amusement is just sending Bronte clips of Oompa Loompa's singing because it makes her rage so much it's great
Somedays I really want to explain to people a different opinion, but I know they won't listen and it's so frustrating
Twitter really is one of the most negative places at times...:/
Cold cold cold cold cold cold cold. Edinburgh, you're cold.
I wish I didn't feel so awkward cooking dinner with other people who aren't in my flat in my kitchen...always think they're judging me
I should just learn to not watch the kids react to stuff I know on the Fine Bros channel because I just get upset and feel old
Feeling so low, but virgin just told me it's 12 days til I see Mum again so I'm psyched
I also realise my friends from high school would probably be surprised at how excited I am for Arctic Monkeys props night, how times change
A moment to mourn my Night Owl Eyeliner, you have been incredible. Now time to get my next one from the cupboard because I got sent one <3
I mean, you'll also find out you want to do a degree that'll help you save the world, so you know, we had a bit of a big turnaround
...and there'll come a day when you realise that even though that was your darkest hour, it allowed you to find a much brighter future.
...you will learn you are better than the people who drag you down, and you will keep running for your goals and smashing them every time...
...you'll hate your mum and what you look like and detest the world for what it's done to you. But, 13 year old me, it gets better...
...you are about to enter the toughest point of your life it will be grim, and you will feel darker than you ever have before...
Realising that I probably wouldn't want to tell 15 year old me anything, but I do have a message for 13 year old me...
You're going to find people who actually do care, even if it's not in the town you come from. You are strong. #WhatIWouldTellA15YearOldMe
I mean I have gotten out of bed to make tea...that counts as being productive right? Can't believe it's back to uni Monday </3
It's cold, it's cold, it's cold
Rosie and Christie just having me in hysterics I love this holiday
Well, I still can't handle goodbyes, I feel we just need to admit I'm 20, I'm probably always going to cry at them
Had the best day with my crazy mum https://t.co/pdlKVDFHEP
@brendonburieto "it's better than echo falls" professional wine taster right there
Just introduced mum to the 'Fresh Prince of Bel-Air' and she loves it see my choice is amazing
He's been meowing for me, my little kitten (although he's a large cat now) â¤ https://t.co/fnbAjbaN6g
I want my cat already ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­
Mum's saying the train journey is all a big adventure and I'm here like I've taken this 4 times in 2 weeks it's just dull not exciting
To think this time in a week I'll be in Copenhagen...ahhhhh!
Never clicked on a video so fast, the lyrics are incredible <3 #TheScriptUnite
It's -7 outside and I just get an email from forever 21 talking about swimwear previews- no thanks I don't want to die from the cold
My new dentist is lovely, so happy!
I have a new dentist, let's hope I don't end up freaked out again
Hahahaha time for the dentist who I don't trust hahahaha fun times
@LizzieWilliams8 dont be so modest, you know youre the best
Stay positive Smallwood, stay positive.
The only drama I want is the drama in my sims games and the books I read, thanks
How can people crave drama like literally all I want in life is some bloody peace and quiet stop with needing drama just relax
So much needs to be done to make sure we don't destroy this planet, why don't people realise this
Reading the news and realising one of my big fears for 2017 is Trump dismantling all the work that's gone into combating climate change
Vicar of Dibley ended 1st January 2007...ten years ago. I'm old. So old.
Tristan in Vicar of Dibley is Peter Capaldi, why does no one else realise this
Everytime we watch the Christmas lunch incidient in the Vicar of Dibley, I have to convince Mum it is Peter Capaldi
Two hours to go ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­
@amelie_elyse come to Edinburgh I will teach you the way of alcohol and dresses
Kay pokemon moon, time for you to save me...3 hours to go
This train is hurting me. Not because the train is awful, its nice. But my hangover is awful
Everyone in my flat is so drunk, I mean I'm drunk too but this is ridiculous
@amelie_elyse HAPPY NEw YEAR YOU BEAUTY
happy new year guys have a good one xx
HAPPY NEW YEAR YOU BEAUTIES I LOVE YOU
This is my party, so why do I get the feeling I'm going to completely hate every second of it?
Still can't get over that; never had someone refuse to move before
I'm sorry but the reservations do apply I need to charge my phone time to ask them to move or battle this out.
People on the train refusing to move even though others have reserved those seats. Twats.
I have my latte and panini all is well
If the train driver tells us to move further into the carriage at university I'm gonna scream
Ah, you have to love it when the London Midland train feels like the tube at 9am...
My suitcase is packed and consists of three things: makeup, going out clothes and pjs. My kinda weekend
@QDtalksjunk I NEED TO KNOW
Every few minutes my brother talks about stuff that happens later in season 6 like shut up and wait 3 hours we'll get to that
"I drink and I know things" - Tyrion is still the best thing about GoT
"Some people without brains do an awful lot of talking" - still one of my favourite quotes from this film
We got to the DVD title screen and he left, new record
Finally defying my brother and watching Wizard of Oz
So many animals at the brink of extinction :(
The fact that cheetah numbers are crashing just about breaks my heart
Merry Christmas world, it's wine time for my family now! https://t.co/J5RIxKmDYI
As soon as I'm back home I just enter a perpetually hungry state...FEED ME
Happy cat ðŸ˜ https://t.co/nNjWUMTgWR
@MadeULookbyLex thank you so much for the day 12 box, it's so incredible to get just before Christmas ðŸ˜„ðŸ’•
IT'S ARRIVED!! https://t.co/4guzn6jWjl
Happy to be home with my mad hatter mother https://t.co/3zjQAJNdbd
@CarynCanFly you can never have too much pizza
FREEDOM
Kay Smallwood, you can do this. One more exam and then after that you can collapse and not move until you need to pack. You got this.
Please be a nice paper tomorrow please be a nice paper tomorrow
@amelie_elyse Thank you <3
Maybe I'm just really run down...revision is stressful. I think I just need a break. One day left.
On the plus side this time in 48 hours I'll be home with my cat ðŸ˜ðŸ˜ https://t.co/dLuaZhqsuA
I had a nap. Day before exam and I'm napping. Dying of the plague is great for stress! Not.
@ClarkThea Thank you!! I want to go home so bad, just one exam left
@ClarkThea so much worse today, definitely think I have the flu ðŸ’” any other pieces of advice? X
Oh Smallwood you sure know how to pick 'em
Um since when was Wychaven considered the third best district in the UK? Okay, it's pretty. Still got out of there as fast as I could
So bored of proxies...
Two days left of revision, I can do this
My christmas queen @brendonburieto https://t.co/9xNHoNJXHQ
